# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_REPOSITORY_TEST_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_executable(minecpp_repository_test)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_repository_test PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_repository_test
        LINK_PUBLIC
        gtest
        gtest_main
        minecpp_repository
)

add_test(NAME minecpp_repository COMMAND minecpp_repository_test)

configure_file("../../../repository.bin" "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/library/repository/test/repository.bin" COPYONLY)
